entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Testing was slowed to hide the fact that the sudden reopening in states that lacked a stage plan are now seeing an increase in Coronavirus infections. Stop playing games, @VP. These are people's lives you're fucking with and health you're putting at risk. Don't be such a tool.
